full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Reference:** WS3605946636-Doc3859853995

**Solicitation Number:** WS3605946636

**Publication Date:** February 9, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** **March 3, 2023, 14:00:00**

**Amendment Number:** 3

**Acquisition Title:**

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued by the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) for the acquisition of a digital Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR) system.

**System Requirements:**

- The system shall be capable of performing digital PCR and Reverse Transcription Polymerase Chain Reaction (RT-PCR) with high sensitivity and specificity.
- The system shall include all necessary components, software, and accessories required for operation.

**Service Location:**

- The system shall be delivered to Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Québec, Canada.

**Trade Agreement:**

- This solicitation is open to bidders under the following trade agreements:
  - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
  - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Solicitation Details:**

- Required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted electronically by 14:00 EST on March 3, 2023.
- Bids received after the closing date and time will be deemed non-responsive.
- A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted a proposal in the previous solicitation.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Alina Cocieru (SPAC/PSPC), in writing, at:

*Email:* alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
